modName: The Amulet of Kings from Oblivion
summary: whooo !!! evry one this mod make the amulet of kings from Cyrodiil to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number17
This is a simple mod but its so cool !!!!
I wondered many times where is the mod that make the amulet of kings available  in skyrim
Whooo!!! its here i did create the amulet of kings but is not like oblivion because you can wear it loool!!!!
see pic its the amulet of Alessia of The emperor uriel septim IIV of Cyrodiil in the elder of scroll 4 oblivion
the amulet of kings have the red gems its look very beautiful and it have all the nine divines enchantement in one amulet

The amulet is Located in 3 locations 
1) in sovngard table where all the nord hero is sitting
2) in the hight hrothgar table where ulfric tullius and all the jarls will stay during that quest
3) in the final chest of bleak falls berrow

bye everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number17 
ENJOY!!!!!
author: skull19972
